name: Ninja Escape - Skyrocket Up
description:
Jump as high as you can with the most fearless Ninja Wye!
Will you make him small jumps or catch the power-up coin to shoot for the moon?
Bounce up but be sure to avoid Shuriken on platforms.

It’s up to you in this arcade adventure that will test your skills. If you can handle all this casual action, challenge your friends to beat your high score in Leader board.

=== How To Play ===

Tilts your device left or right to make Wye jump high. More tilt More powerful jump.

=================

What are you waiting for? Download now to experience the stunting graphics and action fun!
